categories: Category:Star Wars: The Old Republic voice actors

nodes.text: Erik McDowell is an American voice actor who voiced the Mantellian Separatist Jex in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.

McDowell was born in New York, and grew up in New York City. At a young age, he acted on stage and in some independent movies in his home state. After starting his professional career in acting being in the award-winning short So, What Do You Think?, McDowell moved to Los Angeles to continue his career path.
